title: build failure on OS X 10.6.8
body:
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull", "hg update default", rebuild, and
retry
what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?

Try to build (cd src && ./all.bash)

What is the expected output?

Normal successful build.

What do you see instead?

# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, darwin/amd64.
lib9
libbio
libmach
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
cmd/cov
cmd/nm
cmd/objdump
cmd/pack
cmd/prof
cmd/cc
cmd/gc
cmd/6l
cmd/6a
cmd/6c
cmd/6g
pkg/runtime
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zgoarch_amd64.go:5: theGoarch redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version_amd64.go:2
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zgoos_darwin.go:5: theGoos redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version_darwin.go:2
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zversion.go:5: defaultGoroot redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version.go:3
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zversion.go:6: theVersion redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version.go:4
go tool dist: FAILED: /Users/s/opt/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6g -o $WORK/_go_.6 -p
runtime -+ /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/compiler.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/debug.go /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/error.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/extern.go /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/mem.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/softfloat64.go /Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/type.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version_amd64.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/version_darwin.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zgoarch_amd64.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zgoos_darwin.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zruntime_defs_darwin_amd64.go
/Users/s/opt/go/src/pkg/runtime/zversion.go



Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

amd64


Which operating system are you using?

OS X 10.6.8

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

7e4c7879d395 tip


Please provide any additional information below.
